subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: My grandfather died the week after “In the Heights” opened on Broadway, leaving a gaping hole in our family. When I think of Yankee Stadium, I think of countless games at his side.
snippet: My grandfather died the week after “In the Heights” opened on Broadway, leaving a gaping hole in our family. When I think of Yankee Stadium, I think of countless games at his side.
